00024 namespace cwchess {
00025 
00026 inline Piece PieceIterator::operator*() const
00027 {
00028   return M_chess_position->M_pieces[M_current_index];
00029 }
00030 
00031 inline Piece const* PieceIterator::operator->(void) const
00032 {
00033   return& M_chess_position->M_pieces[M_current_index];
00034 }
00035
